DSCTag Properties

Requires: Base Development System

Inherits from Generic»GObject»Control»IOName. View the class hierarchy.

To use the properties in this class, you must install the LabVIEW Datalogging and Supervisory Control module.

PropertyDescription
Allow Undefined TagsAllows tag names which are not defined in the Tag Editor to be entered. Details
Default ValueGets or sets the default value of the tag control. Details
ValueValue of the tag control. Details
Value (Signaling)Sets the value of the control and generates a Value Change event. Details
